scripts.start: yarn delete:redis && cross-env-shell 'concurrently -p '{name}' -n 'redis,server,eslint' -c 'gray.bgWhite,yellow.bgBlue,orange.bgWhite' "yarn start:redis" "yarn start:server" "yarn lint"'
scripts.start:server: NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development}; SLS_DEBUG=* yarn sls:dotenv && serverless offline start
scripts.emulate:local: NODE_ENV=development; yarn sls:dotenv && node -r esm -r dotenv/config src/cli/index.js dotenv_config_path=./.serverless/.env
scripts.create:redis: NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development}; (docker run --name cache_tfp_redis_${NODE_ENV} -d -p 6379:6379 redis redis-server --requirepass localpass || true) && yarn stop:redis ;
scripts.start:redis: NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development}; yarn create:redis ; docker start -a cache_tfp_redis_${NODE_ENV}
scripts.start:redis:daemon: NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development}; yarn create:redis && docker start cache_tfp_redis_${NODE_ENV}
scripts.delete:redis: NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development}; yarn stop:redis && docker rm cache_tfp_redis_${NODE_ENV} -f || true
scripts.flush:redis: NODE_ENV=${NODE_ENV:-development}; export `cat .env.${NODE_ENV} | sed -e '/^[ \t]*#/d' | tr -d ' '` && REDIS_PORT=`echo $REDIS_URL | cut -d':' -f2` && echo FLUSHALL | npx redis-cli -h `echo $REDIS_URL | cut -d':' -f1` -a $REDIS_PASSWORD -p $REDIS_PORT
scripts.deploy:all: yarn deploy:demo && yarn deploy:skema && yarn deploy:gem && yarn deploy:essec
scripts.deploy:all:production: yarn deploy:demo:production && yarn deploy:skema:production && yarn deploy:gem:production && yarn deploy:essec:production
scripts.emulate:demo: NODE_ENV=staging yarn sls:dotenv -s demoStaging && node -r esm -r dotenv/config src/cli/index.js dotenv_config_path=./.serverless/.env
scripts.emulate:demo:production: NODE_ENV=production yarn sls:dotenv -s demo && node -r esm -r dotenv/config src/cli/index.js dotenv_config_path=./.serverless/.env
scripts.preversion: yarn doc:toc && yarn lint:once && yarn test:once
scripts.release: yarn bump --prompt --commit --tag && git add CHANGELOG.md README.md && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push && git push --tags
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test yarn sls:dotenv && yarn delete:redis ; yarn start:redis:daemon && jest --runInBand --watchAll
scripts.test:once: NODE_ENV=test yarn sls:dotenv && yarn delete:redis ; yarn start:redis:daemon && jest --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit && yarn stop:redis
scripts.test:coverage: NODE_ENV=test yarn sls:dotenv && yarn delete:redis ; yarn start:redis:daemon && jest --coverage --runInBand --detectOpenHandles --forceExit && yarn stop:redis
